站.definition: station; to stand; to halt; to stop; branch of a company or organization; website

站前區.definition: Zhanqian district of Yingkou City 營口市|营口市, Liaoning

站地.definition: stop (on a bus or train route)

站崗.definition: to stand guard; to serve on sentry duty

站牌.definition: bus stop sign; train station sign

站穩腳步.definition: to gain a firm foothold; (fig.) to get oneself established

站穩腳跟.definition: to stand firmly; to gain a foothold; to establish oneself

站立.definition: to stand; standing; on one's feet

站臺.definition: platform (at a railway station); (Tw) (of an influential person) to publicly lend one's support (e.g. for an election candidate); (Tw) website

站著說話不腰疼.pinyin: zhan4 zhe5 shuo1 hua4 bu4 yao1 teng2
站著說話不腰疼.definition: (saying) it's all very well to talk, but getting things done is another matter; (fig.) to be an armchair expert; to blabber on

站起.definition: to get up on hind legs (esp. of horse); to stand; to spring up

站長.definition: person in charge of a train station 車站|车站[che1 zhan4] (stationmaster), website 網站|网站[wang3 zhan4] (webmaster), volunteer center 志工站[zhi4 gong1 zhan4] (center manager), etc

站隊.definition: to line up; to stand in line; (fig.) to take sides; to side with sb; to align oneself with a faction

站點.definition: a place set up to serve a specific function (train station, bus stop, toll plaza, bike rental station, meteorological station etc); (Internet) site (website, FTP site etc)
